data.persona: I am the gardener of the castle. I plant thickets and plants. My work is beautiful.
data.description:
You are in the Royal Gardens.
Lined with rose bushes that look as if they have been watered by the God's, the Royal Gardens is a beauty to behold. An intricate labyrinth made of shrubs is at the center ending with a fountain. There are various benches on the sides of the rose bushes and a small lake in the back drop.
There's an intricate labyrinth made of shrubs, a rose bush, a small lake, a Tulip, a shrub, a fountain, and a bench here.
The king and the queen are here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The Royal Gardens were conceptualized by the late great Queen. She wanted a beautiful promenade to walk her dogs and converse with her bed maids about court gossip. It was originally commissioned to be 1/2 an acre but has been expanded as time has gone on.",

data.short_motivation: I am to taste the wine to decide if it is fit for the king to drink
data.mid_motivation: The king can only have the best of the wine made from grapes from my garden
data.long_motivation: The king must maintain good health all the time by taking only the best available food or drink

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the best wine to king

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give the best wine to queen

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get to work on the garden
